lyrics:
3 contributorsnothin’ good about goodbye lyricsverse 1
rolled up my sleeves today
cause i thought that this was over
but then you called to say
you forgot that broach of your mother’s

refrain
and every time i try to cut the cord
you come crawlin’ back with some excuse
you forgot somethin’

chorus
there’s nothin’ good about goodbye
i could swear i saw you cry
always knew you’d wind up fafallin’ fafallin’ harder
nothin’ good about goodbye
well just say goodbye

verse 2
rolled up my sleeves today
cause i thought that this had ended
but then you called again
to tell me how you’re gonna blow my best friend

refrain
and every time i try to cut the cord
you come crawlin’ back with some excuse
you forgot somethin’
see hinder liveget tickets as low as 63you might also likechorus 2

every story has two sides
in a he said she said fight
but she’ll always wind up fafallin’ fafallin’ harder

well just say goodbye
